question:
Complete the sentence with the appropriate word from the list:
'Holland,' as it is __________________________ known to most of us abroad - a name stemming from its once most prominent provinces - has more going on per kilometre than most countries, and more English-speaking natives.

Complete the sentence with the appropriate word from the list:
Welcome to the Netherlands, a tiny country that only extends, at its broadest, 312 km north to south, and 264 km east to west - although the land area increases slightly each year as a _______________ of continuous land reclamation and drainage

Complete the sentence with the appropriate word from the list:
Cattle and chicken are ______________________ animals.

Complete the sentence with the appropriate word from the list:
Don't forget to _________ the letter before you post it.

fill in the gap with the appropriate word from the list:
he turned up his ______________________ to protect his neck from the blowing wind.

Complete the sentence with the appropriate word from the list:
How are we going to identify him ___________ all these people? It's impossible.

Complete the sentence with the appropriate word from the list:
I often judge a book by looking at its _______.

fill in the gap with appropriate word from the list:
I'm going to spend a few days with some ______________________ of mine who live on the continent.

Complete the sentence with the appropriate word from the list:
It's an old and large house, so the __________________ costs are very high.

Complete the sentence with the appropriate word from the list:
Major newspapers have expressed their _________ about the economic situation of the country.

Complete the sentence with the appropriate word from the list:
Many animals ________ to other regions when the weather changes.

Complete the sentence with the appropriate word from the list:misuse / develop / use / exploit
Many multinational companies only move to developing countries in order to _________ them.

Complete the sentence with the appropriate word from the list:degree / field / topic / subject
Maths was one __________ I was never good at.

Complete the sentence with the appropriate word from the list:cured / attended / healed / treated
Mike had to stay in hospital for several weeks where he was __________ for a heart weakness.

Complete the sentence with the appropriate word from the list:regret / grief / disturbance / gloom
Mrs. Butler was in deep ________________ after her husband's sudden death.

Complete the sentence with the appropriate word from the list:live / alive / life / living
My oldest __________________ relative is over 90.

Complete the sentence with the appropriate word from the list:explained / informed / reported / advised
Nobody _________ me about any changes in the secretary's itinerary.

Complete the sentence with the appropriate word from the list:bed / end / bottom /deep
Nobody knows what kind of plants you can find at the ____________ of the ocean

Complete the sentence with the appropriate word from the list: line /entry / access/ link
Now if we want mobile _________to the web, we have to travel around with things like tablets and smartphones in our bags or pockets.

Complete the sentence with the appropriate word from the list: from start/ from noting/ from scratch / from zero
Only if you are a proficient speaker of a language that you have learned _______ in adulthood, can you really tell how hard it is for someone to get that level.

Complete the sentence with the appropriate word from the list:draw / turn / close / shut
Please, ________ the curtains so that nobody can see us.

Complete the sentence with the appropriate word from the list:whole / complete / full / total
The _________ number of infections has increased to over a thousand.

Complete the sentence with the appropriate word from the list:former / prior / past / late
The ___________ prime minister has moved to a residence in the countryside.

Complete the sentence with the appropriate word from the list: based/ started / founded/ begun
The idea is _____________on simple technology that is already in existence.

Complete the sentence with the appropriate word from the list:direct / straight / instant / immediate
The manager is always in _________ contact with his players

Complete the sentence with the appropriate word from the list:coloured / stained / polluted / marked
The red wine you have spilt _________ the carpet.

Complete the sentence with the appropriate word from the list:thoughts / minute / moment / time
There's no need to rush. Take your ____________ before you give me your answer.

Complete the sentence with the appropriate word from the list: site / mark / point / time
There's no turning back. This is the ________ of no return.

Complete the sentence with the appropriate word from the list:border / boundary / bank / edge
Thousands of refugees have crossed the ____________ since fighting in the region started.

complete the sentence with the appropriate word from the list: sit/ catch / do / make
the possibilities are countless and the nationwide tourist office, which is on hand to give you information and___________
reservations.
_____________________ looking everywhere, i simply couldn't find the car keys.
a written set of questions which you give to a large number of people in order to collect information is called a/an_____.

choose an antonym to the bold word:
the computer comes with a year’s warranty on all parts.
choose the odd word:
dad _____________________ at the clock and saw that it was time to leave
he has shown outstanding leadership __________.
i asked if i could speak to the person in _______________ of the store.
i don't like reading history or biography books. i prefer reading __________________ .
i hate nothing more than long car _____________________ .
i have decided to _____________________ my hair red because i haven't had that before.
if you want the job you must send your _____________________ to the manager directly.

choose an antonym to the bold word:
in the six months since it was launched the car has sold extremely well.
it can _________________ a long time to get to the top of your career
it was an unpleasant competition for him but he could face____ to it.
it's very unhealthy to ______________ the potatoes in animal oil.
jeans will never be out of _____________________.
my sister was made _____________________ a few weeks ago and is still looking for a job.
since the middle of the 1960s great _____________________ has been made in technology.
some people _____________________ to the city from the outlying suburbs every day.
something that is no longer needed and has been thrown away is a____.
the _____________________ for this type of job starts at about € 40,000 a year.
the children spent the whole afternoon ______________________ blackberries.
the plane flew circles over the airport until the ______________________ was clear.
the quality of always being the same or always being good is __________.
to ____________ is to make the best use of something.

which of the following words is a synonym to the bold word:
unfortunately our competitors have brought out a new product and it looks very good.
why don't you wear ______________________ when you work in the kitchen?
you can exchange the shoes any time you like but you must keep the _____________________.
you must pay income tax based on the amount you _____________________ every year.
you should lower your _____________________. it isn't easy to be a famous model in today's world.
